Rituals & Sex Magick' (I-H-O paperback, 1999).Page 300 Invocation of HorusAlternate (printed) version of this ritual can be found in: 'The Equinox of the Gods'.Page 311 Advertisements Page 313Back cover - Contents *Note: The original, 1996 paperback edition of Mr Konig's compilation was published with an incorrect page order. The correct page sequence should run: Pages 001, to 247: Followed by Pages 269, to 281: Followed by Pages 248, to 268: Followed by Pages 282, to 313. This, together with other minor issues, have been corrected. All pages affected by this amendment are marked (top right) with the original edition's page number in black, and the Black Flag edition's page number in red (As illustrated: right). The sequence listed in the Index is not affected. We are indebted to Mr Plastic Spider Thing, for pointing out this error.
